title: Bug 114905: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying it
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR: New a report parameter, set the Display type to List Box. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and observe.
